name: tasselled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
decorated with a tassel or tassels: a tasselled window blind See
tassel
More examplesFewer examplesDraped round his shoulders was a tasselled white silk scarf.Wearing a rather absurd black tasselled fez, he delivered his speech slowly. A decorative curtain is edged with deep fringing and held in place by tasselled cord.a fabulous gold tasselled dress He slid into his own tasselled loafers and headed for the telephone at the far end of the hall.
